biotools.summary: Cache oblivious mapper that is designed to map short reads to reference genome. It maps short reads with respect to user defined error threshold. In this manual, we will show how to choose the parameters and tune the tool with respect to the library settings.

bioschemas.name: mrsFAST-Ultra
bioschemas.summary: Cache oblivious mapper that is designed to map short reads to reference genome. It maps short reads with respect to user defined error threshold. In this manual, we will show how to choose the parameters and tune the tool with respect to the library settings.
